data.name: Error_UnableToConnectToServer
data.value: PokerTell was unable to connect to the {0} server as specified in the settings. Please make sure the {0} server is running and check the Database Settings. Ensure that the servername, username and possibly password were entered correctly.

data.name: MySql_Queries_CreateTables
SQLite_Queries_CreateTables
Warning_DatabaseExistsException
data.value: The database you are trying to create already exists. Therefore it could not be created. If you were trying to delete all its data, use Clear Database instead.

data.name: Warning_UnableToConnectToDatabase
data.value: PokerTell was unable to connect to the Database specified in the settings. Please make sure the MySql Server is running and check the Database Settings using the Database Menu. Check that the hostname, username, password were entered correctly and that you chose an existing database or created one.

data.name: Info_SuccessfullyConnectedToServer
data.value: Successfully connected to the {0} server. Don't forget to save these settings and finally you should create and/or choose a database to use with it.

data.name: Warning_PokerOfficeNotFound
data.value: Couldn't find a PokerOffice installation. If you are sure it is installed carefully enter the values that you find in PokerOffice/Database/NetworkSettings.

data.name: Warning_MySqlNotUsedInPokerOffice
data.value: You are not using a MySQL Database in PokerOffice.Follow the help file instructions to install the MySQL Server and change to MySQL Database in PokerOffice.

data.name: Info_FoundMySqInstallation
data.value: Found MySql {0} installed on your computer.

data.name: Warning_MySqlInstallationNotFound
data.value: PokerTell was unable to find a MySql installatin on your computer.\nIf you are sure it is installed enter the appropriate settings and test the connection. If still unsuccessful consider reinstalling the MySql server.

data.name: Error_ProviderNotFoundInSettings
data.value: The {0} data provider was not found in the settings. Please reconfigure it.

data.name: Error_SettingsContainInvalidServerConnectString
data.value: The server connection for {0} defined in the settings is invalid. Please reconfigure it.

data.name: Warning_NoDataProviderDefinedInSettings
data.value: No data provider has been found. Please define it by using Choose Data Provider form the Database Menu.

data.name: Warning_NoConfiguredDataProvidersFoundInSettings
data.value: PokerTell couldn't find any configured dataprovider. To remedy this please first configure a server to be used as your data provider.

data.name: Info_DataProviderChosen
data.value: The {0} server was chosen as your data provider and the settings saved successfully.

data.name: Warning_AllDataInDatabaseWillBeLost
data.value: All the data in the database "{0}" will be lost! Are you sure?

data.name: Info_DatabaseCreated
data.value: Database {0} was created successfully. In order to use it as your PokerTell database make sure to choose it via the {1} Menu.

data.name: Error_UnableToConnectToDatabaseSpecifiedInTheSettings
data.value: PokerTell was unable to connect to the database specified in the settings. Please choose/create another database.

data.name: Hint_EnsureExternalServerIsRunning
data.value: Since your data provider is {0}, make sure, that its server is running.

data.name: Warning_NoDatabaseHasBeenChosenForCurrentProvider
data.value: No database has been chosen for the current data provider ({0}). Either create/choose a database to be used with {0 } or choose another data provider.
